choices.B: It provides better solution suites by focusing exclusively on WAN.

questions.question_text: What is one way that Cisco provides business value to customers?

discussion.content: answer is A

questions.question_text: Which solution offers complete collaboration for midsize businesses up to 1000 employees?

discussion.content:
answer is c: Premises-based collaboration solutions: The Cisco®
Business Edition 6000 (BE6000) offers premium voice,
video, mobility, messaging, instant messaging and
presence, contact center, and web conferencing. The
solution provides core communication capabilities that
midsize businesses need. If you expect to grow beyond
1,000 users or need a large on-premises deployment,
consider the Cisco Business Edition 7000 (BE7000).

Selected Answer: A
Answer A
Business Edition 6000 (BE6k)

The business edition 6000, often referred to as the BE6k, offers complete collaboration for midsize businesses. Your customers want to connect with co-workers, customers, and business partners from anywhere using any device. More than just an IP phone system, the BE6k is an all-in-one solution that solves complex communications challenges for businesses with up to 1000 employees.

Complete collaboration for midsized businesses
Cisco Business Edition 6000 is more than just an IP phone system. It is an all-in-one solution that solves complex communications challenges for business with up to 1,000 employees.
https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/products/unified-communications/business-edition-6000/index.html
there is no Cisco UC1k so the answer should be A

Premises-based collaboration solutions: The Cisco® Business Edition 6000 (BE6000) offers premium voice, video, mobility, messaging, instant messaging and presence, contact center, and web conferencing. The solution provides core communication capabilities that midsize businesses need. If you expect to grow beyond 1,000 users or need a large on-premises deployment, consider the Cisco Business Edition 7000 (BE7000).

choices.D: Organizations can trust in the innovative focus of Cisco Unified Fabric, allowing IT teams to focus on maintaining technology.
choices.A: Cisco Unified Fabric can only be used in LAN environments.
choices.B: Organizations must be in the cloud in order to benefit from Cisco Unified Fabric.
choices.C: Cisco Unified Fabric enables industry-leading, multidimensional scalability.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
Answer C

Cisco Unified Fabric includes some of the following features: 

Transparent convergence for LAN and SAN environments
Industry-leading, multidimensional scalability, including system, fabric, and geographic span 
Sophisticated intelligence 
Transparent data center convergence

Cisco Unified Fabric offers multidimensional scalability, encompassing device scale, fabric and system scalability, and geographic span, which enables the Cisco Unified Fabric to scale within the data center and also across data centers, creating a true unified network.

looks like C

questions.question_text: Which statement about Cisco Unified Fabric is true?

choices.B: switches, routers, and application delivery controllers
choices.A: application delivery controllers, LAN, and WAN
choices.C: switches, routers, application delivery controllers, LAN, and WAN

discussion.content:
looks like D
Cisco Systems offered application delivery controllers, until leaving the market in 2012. Market leaders like F5 Networks, Radware and Citrix had been gaining market share from Cisco in previous years.
Cisco has no application delivery controllers in his Networking Product line
I think that the correct answer is B
